allow:
Bash(python -c "
import pandas as pd

# Read both CSV files
simple = pd.read_csv(''evaluation/simple_retrieval_results.csv'')
advanced = pd.read_csv(''evaluation/advanced_retrieval_results.csv'')

# Calculate mean for each metric
metrics = [''context_recall'', ''faithfulness'', ''context_precision'', ''answer_relevancy'', ''factual_correctness(mode=f1)'']

# Create comparison data
data = []
for metric in metrics:
    simple_val = simple[metric].mean()
    advanced_val = advanced[metric].mean()
    diff = advanced_val - simple_val
    winner = ''Advanced'' if diff > 0 else ''Simple''
    data.append({
        ''Metric'': metric,
        ''Simple'': f''{simple_val:.4f}'',
        ''Advanced'': f''{advanced_val:.4f}'',
        ''Difference'': f''{diff:+.4f}'',
        ''Winner'': winner
    })

# Add overall average
simple_avg = simple[metrics].mean().mean()
advanced_avg = advanced[metrics].mean().mean()
diff_avg = advanced_avg - simple_avg
winner_avg = ''Advanced'' if diff_avg > 0 else ''Simple''
data.append({
    ''Metric'': ''OVERALL AVERAGE'',
    ''Simple'': f''{simple_avg:.4f}'',
    ''Advanced'': f''{advanced_avg:.4f}'',
    ''Difference'': f''{diff_avg:+.4f}'',
    ''Winner'': winner_avg
})

# Create DataFrame and print
df = pd.DataFrame(data)
print(df.to_string(index=False))
")
